description.value:
• Action Cost: 2 [Combat] actions
  • Range: 60 feet
  • Effect: Choose a 20-foot square within range that contains natural vegetation. Plants animate and grasp at creatures. All creatures in area make [[/save type=reflex]] (Agility + Luck) opposed by your Wisdom + Earth Mastery. If you win (more net successes), they become Restrained. Creatures can use 1 [Combat] action to break free ([[/check skill=athletics]] requiring 2 successes). Effect lasts 1 minute or until all creatures escape. Hirnaloyta's fury animates the natural world.
  • Usage: Uses 1 Channel Divinity
